title: ethernetDetailItemRequest
description: Details of an ethernet service. These details are used for Serviceability Requests.

objectType.description: The type of the object, ethernetDetailItemRequest.

interfaceType.description: The UNI Handoff interface type to connect to the end customer's network (e.g., Electrical).
interfaceType.title: Interface Type

accessMedium.description: The type of media the service  should delivered over (e.g., Fiber, Coax, Twisted Pair).
accessMedium.title: Access Medium

enniRequired.description: Indicates if a new NNI needs to be established for this service.
enniRequired.title: ENNI Required

buyerEnniId.description: The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to the existing ENNI that is to be used to support this service.
buyerEnniId.title: Buyer ENNI Identifier

classOfService.description: The desired Class of Service, as defined by MEF 23.1.
classOfService.title: Class Of Service

pricingTerm.description: The length of the service contract in months.
pricingTerm.title: Pricing Term

desiredActivationDate.description: The desired activation date for the service formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).
desiredActivationDate.title: Desired Activation Date
